features: 🖤 BLACK COMPLEX (Truffles, blackberries, black bean, black cumin extract) - Elevates skin condition with hydrating, antioxidant, and calming effects.
💦 LOW pH LEVEL OF 5.5 - Ideal for morning cleansing and sensitive skin, removing impurities while maintaining a healthy skin balance.
🍦 CREAMY DENSE TEXTURE - Soft and mild on the skin with a hydrating finish.

🌿 BLACK COMPLEX - Tuber Melanosporum Extract (Truffle), Rubus Fruticosus (Blackberry) Fruit Extract, Nigella Sativa Seed Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Seed Extract enhances hydration and the overall health of the skin.
FROM KLAIRS' GENTLE BLACK LINE - Part of Klairs' Gentle Black Line, this low pH facial cleanser ensures gentle yet effective cleansing with a hydrating touch.
body.description: Water, Glycerin, Sodium Cocoyl Glycinate, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Lauryl Betaine, Hydroxyacetophenone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Chloride, Decylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, Laminaria Japonica Extract, Eclipta Prostrata Leaf Extract, Nigella Sativa Seed Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Fructooligosaccharides, Amaranthus Caudatus Seed Extract, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract, Beta-Glucan, Ficus Carica (Fig) Fruit Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Rubus Fruticosus (Blackberry) Fruit Extract, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Tuber Melanosporum Extract, Tocopherol, Ceramide Np, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Seed Extract, Aspartic Acid, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My holy grail cleanser
reviews.reviewText: I am obsessed with this cleanser! I’m a big fan of dear, klairs and usually order from wishtrend, so I’m glad they sell this on Amazon! I have combination, sensitive skin and live in the Pacific Northwest so it’s pretty damp here. This cleanser does not have any fragrance or smell and has a soft texture. It foams up really well and I can get by with less than a nickel size worth. I have used it daily in the morning and evening for years.Pros:Lightweight, foams up wellNo scentNot irritatingNo residue after rinsingCons:None! Seriously. None. I love this cleanser and I hope you do too :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my first Klairs purchase and I am ready to become a faithful devotee to this brand! This cleanser is literally PERFECT! The initial texture is a thick-yet-milky, soft cream. It foams easily and quickly in hands or on face. It completely cleanses the skin and rinses away without drying out or stripping the skin or leaving a residue, and it is unscented. I have never before found a facial cleanser that THOROUGHLY cleans AND hydrates my face! This works wonderfully with my Clarisonic Mia 2, but my face gets clean even when I wash only by hand--that has NEVER happened with any other facial cleanser I have used! Only a tiny amount is needed to cleanse entire face--slightly more than pea-sized but definitely less than dime-sized. The tube I received was completely filled with product, and I wash my face morning and evening. PERFECT PRODUCT, EXCELLENT VALUE, AMAZING QUALITY, HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This says black which made me think of charcoal but it wasn't. It is a gentle cleanser that didn't irritate me or leave me tight. I feel like it really softens my skin as I scrub rather than scratching it. Ingredients are a lot of natural ones instead of chemicals. No issues on my oily forehead or dry rest of face. Kinda pricey for size but start with it a little to lather up first.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been dealing with a lot of product claims to be non drying but this one is true. It is gentle and non drying, and a tiny dab goes a long way! It is the best foam cleanser I have ever used and I have tried many reputable brands. DearKlairs is a great brand but this product is particularly amazing. My search for that perfect foam cleanser is over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cleans skin well and doesn't dry it out...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing cleanser, so moisturizing!
reviews.reviewText: I love K-products and use them for most of my skincare routine. I was looking for a cleanser that wouldn’t strip my skin. Although I tend to do my skincare right after I wash my face, I do like to feel like my face can go without anything for a bit without being dry and stripped. This cleanser delivered on that! I’ve had it for a couple of months now and I’ve used it everyday and it just feels so nice on the skin. I like the bottle design, easy cap to open and close and dispense the amount you need, and the consistency is just *special*. I’ve never had or seen a cleanser like this one before. A little goes a veeery long way, trust me on this, and what I like to do is just damp my skin and put a small amount on my fingers and then just gently rub it onto my face. It foams very differently from other cleansers. It has a milky foam texture that ressembles a milk cleanser when used on damp skin but with that extra oomph of foamy goodness that is just right. The product is white but is called “black facial cleanser” because of the ingredients in it which are all derived from black fruits and extracts. When you add some water, it will foam like a regular cleanser - but try it on damp skin first, and thank me later. It washes off all of the impurities, it’s mildly acidic so I would say it’s PH balanced, very gentle and moisturizing and is unscented. I have sensitive skin and this has been my go to cleanser and honestly, the rest of my cleansers have just taken the back seat for now. And the bottle is generous so it’ll last me a long time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This has become my favorite face wash. I highly recommend it to all my friends and family. Will definitely continue to purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars worth to buy
reviews.reviewText: I have really dry skin and after I use this, this does not dry out my skin. The price is really worth to buy and good for skin. It is foaming too and I love it.
Foams up so nicely. A little goes a long ways! Responsible brand with simple ingredients. Face is squeaky clean after rinse but does not leave skin feeling stripped or dry.

This is the second time I have bought this cleanser.During summer, I have combination skin, but in winter, it gets very dry. This product doesn’t make my skin dry or oily in any season. It's just perfect for me.
Currently using in the summer and my skin feels so clean. Foams well and no chemical smell. It's the perfect product.
泡切れもよく、さっぱりとした使用感です。

reviews.reviewTitle: Make the native reviews make sense bc I’m stumped! love this cleanser…it’s so nice
reviews.reviewText: Loveeee this cleanser, make the negative reviews make sense, lol, I don’t get it. For reference I have combo sensitive skin…..this is my new holy grail night time 2nd cleanser. I used to use krave beauty hemp cleanser but no longer support the company due to ingredient changes without informing people and have been on the unsuccessful replacement hunt UNTIL this. This cleanser makes my skin glow, clears my pores, gets all makeup off, I’m clean but not feeling tight or like it tampered with my skin barrier or natural moisture. Soooo glad I ignored reviews and tried it. My new holy grail.
